Body: Next Steps Updated: Continue to test different methods of the least privileged model as well as role-based access to slowly implement these changes into your production environment.

What We've Learned Updated: Reviewed the configurations for some jobs within the File System parent group and verified that the service account being used in the connection profile of the job is successfully completing and capturing data with the implementation of the least privileged model. 

We also identified the below error within the FSAC system scan job. 

GetFSACIniAttributeValue: Error: Ini section for CAWDCAPP322 does not exist in ini file  C:ProgramDataNetwrixActivity MonitorAgentSBTFileMon.ini"  CAWDCAPP322

We verified that this error is valid due to the ini file not having the agent hostname listed in the configuration file. Due to the nature of using the agent as a proxy to monitor file system activity on a Unity host the agent hostname is not listed within the ini file but the Unity hosts are listed.

I will create a new ticket to address this issue and gather more information on identifying the
